name: citation-js
description: Citation.js converts formats like BibTeX, Wikidata JSON and ContentMine JSON to CSL-JSON to convert to other formats like APA, Vancouver and back to BibTeX.

scripts.dev:test: npm run babel && npm run test
scripts.dev:test-browser: npm run babel && npm run test && npm run build && npm run build-test
scripts.build: browserify -r ./src/index.js:citation-js -o build/citation.js      -g [ babelify --ignore=citeproc --presets [ env ] ]         && cp build/citation.js      docs/src/citation.js
scripts.build-test: browserify -e test/citation.spec.js      -o build/test.citation.js -g [ babelify --ignore=citeproc --presets [ env ] ] -t brfs && cp build/test.citation.js docs/src/test.citation.js

author: Lars Willighagen (https://larsgw.github.io)
